dc:title.dcterms:alternative: ORAL FOREIGN LANGUAGE COMMUNICATION AS A TOOL FOR FORMATION OF PROFESSIONAL COMPETENCE OF AGROENGINEERING PROFILE STUDENTS

dc:description.ags:descriptionNotes: Keywords: foreign language communication, professional competence of a specialist, the organization of vocational training, speech act

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: В статье рассматриваются некоторые аспекты обучения устному иноязычному общения, которое выступает инструментом формирования профессиональной компетентности студентов агроинженерного профиля.
The article deals with some aspects of foreign language learning of oral communication, which is a tool of professional competence formation of agroengineering profile students.
